alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 3:20AM PST until December 09 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Isolated gusts to 60 mph near Montecito Hills this evening. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
